term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - optical rotatory power
term.title: optical rotatory power

item.text: Angle of optical rotation divided by the optical path length through the medium and by either the mass concentration of the substance giving the specific optical rotatory powerα λ θ or by amount concentration, giving the molar optical rotatory power, αm.
